message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly exceptional and has been meticulously crafted to meet your high standards. Given its value to you, we believe it's worth every penny. We're offering this remarkable product to you for $12,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and exclusivity it offers. We're confident that you'll find this investment well worth the return. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you'd like to proceed with the purchase.
